message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you do $105?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still hesitant, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'm willing to offer it to you for $107.50. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. Can you do $105.50?
Hi Bob, I understand you're close to a decision. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to offer it to you for $106.25. What do you think?
I'm really close, but I think I can get it even better. Can you do $105.75?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I'm still not willing to go below $106. I'll make one more compromise. I'm willing to offer it to you for $106.00. What do you think?
I'm really close, but I think I can get it even better. Can you do $105.75?
